p: Evaluation of the inhibitory effects of Apiaceae essential oils against T. brucei in the study by Ngahang Kamte et al. (2018) [ 57] showed that the oils of some species ( Echinophora spinosa L., Sison amomum L., Crithmum maritimum L. and Helosciadium nodiflorum (L.) Koch) were active, with EC 50 values in the range of 2.7–10.7 μg/mL.
